## Tile.computeWorldOffsetX() method

Computes the offset in the x world coordinates corresponding to this tile, based on its \[\[offset\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
computeWorldOffsetX(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

The x offset.
